title: League isn't opening
body: The launcher opens but it just has the L with the spinning wheel around it, I tried leaving it for a few hours still nothing, I can't even close it it does not not let me I have to actually restart my pc. I'm not very good with computers so if someone can help me fix it that will be great!! Thankyouuuu

replies.body:
I typically see this behavior caused by a *poor connection* to the patching servers. You should be able to resolve this by working through the steps listed in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as this will ensure your local network settings will work with League.

Let me know if this fixed it.
